_id.description: the unique identifier for the course object

term_id.description: the term id associated with the course

college_id.description: the college id associated with the course

subject_id.description: the subject id associated with the course

name.description: the course's friendly name (ex. 'Operating Systems', 'Introduction to Kinesiology', 'Calculus I', 'Composition I')

types.description: an array of types associated with sections of the course (ex. 'Lecture', 'Laboratory', 'Independent Study')

items.description: one of the section types associated with the course

sections.description: an array of section ids associated with the course

ge_id.description: the general education id associated with the course, if one exists

requirement_code.description: the requirement code associated with the course, if one exists (code representing a set of requirements for the course)

requirement_message.description: the requirement message associated with the course, if one exists (explains what is required to take this course)

url.description: the url to the course's page (useful for end users)
